trans-unit.source: Represents the exception that is thrown when you try to access a printer using printer settings that are not valid.
trans-unit.target: 表示当您尝试使用无效的打印机设置访问打印机时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: The most common cause of printer settings that are not valid is referencing a printer that does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 无效的打印机设置的最常见原因引用不存在的打印机。

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: 打印有关的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Drawing.Printing>命名空间概述。</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.InvalidPrinterException"></xref> class.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref> that specifies the settings for a printer.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.InvalidPrinterException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.InvalidPrinterException"></xref>用序列化数据的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象过程中调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>它保存关于所引发异常的序列化的对象数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>它包含有关源或目标的上下文信息。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: The class name is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or <xref:System.Exception.HResult*> is 0.
trans-unit.target: 类名称是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>或<xref:System.Exception.HResult*>为 0。</xref:System.Exception.HResult*>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with information about the exception.
trans-unit.target: 集<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>使用有关异常的信息。

trans-unit.source: The GetObjectData method sets a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> with all the exception object data targeted for serialization.
trans-unit.target: GetObjectData 方法设置<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>用针对于序列化的所有异常对象数据。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: During deserialization, the exception is reconstituted from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> transmitted over the stream.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化期间重建异常从<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>通过流传输。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>它保存关于所引发异常的序列化的对象数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>它包含有关源或目标的上下文信息。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>
